1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Bracket type.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree.Bracket
6  ( -- * Bracket type
7    BracketType (..),
8    getBracketType,
9    -- * Open and close
10    groupOpen,  groupClose,
11    listOpen,   listClose,
12    setOpen,    setClose,
13    tieOpen,    tieClose,
14    relOpen,    relClose,
15    interpOpen, interpClose,
16    typeOpen,   typeClose,
17  ) where
18
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token          as S
21
22-- | Type of bracket.
23data BracketType
24    = BracketGroup    -- ^ Round brackets for grouping: @( E ... )@
25    | BracketList     -- ^ Square brackets for lists: @[ C | ... ]@
26    | BracketSet      -- ^ Curely braces for sets: @{ C | .... }@
27    | BracketTie      -- ^ Curely-single braces for ties: @{- /N C ... -}@
28    | BracketRel      -- ^ Curely-double braces for relations: @{= /N ... [ C | ... ][ C | ... ] =}@
29    | BracketInterp   -- ^ Curely-bar braces for data interpretation: @{| ... /N ... |}@
30    | BracketType     -- ^ Square-single brackets for type: @[- ... -]@
31    | BracketForm     -- ^ Round-bar brackets for form with blanks: @(| V ... | E ... |)@
32    | BracketUnknown  -- ^ Unknown bracket
33      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
34
35-- | Bracket type of token.
36getBracketType :: B.GetBracketType BracketType S.Token
37getBracketType = B.bracketTable
38    [ o BracketGroup   groupOpen  groupClose
39    , o BracketList    listOpen   listClose
40    , o BracketSet     setOpen    setClose
41    , o BracketTie     tieOpen    tieClose
42    , o BracketRel     relOpen    relClose
43    , o BracketInterp  interpOpen interpClose
44    , o BracketType    typeOpen   typeClose
45    , o BracketForm    "(|"       "|)"
46    , (BracketUnknown, S.isOpenToken, S.isCloseToken)
47    ] where o t a b = (t, S.isOpenTokenOf a, S.isCloseTokenOf b)
48
49-- | Open group: @"("@
50groupOpen :: String
51groupOpen = "("
52
53-- | Close group: @")"@
54groupClose :: String
55groupClose = ")"
56
57-- | Open list: @"["@
58listOpen :: String
59listOpen = "["
60
61-- | Close list: @"]"@
62listClose :: String
63listClose = "]"
64
65-- | Open set: @"{"@
66setOpen :: String
67setOpen = "{"
68
69-- | Close set: @"}"@
70setClose :: String
71setClose = "}"
72
73-- | Open tie: @"{-"@
74tieOpen :: String
75tieOpen = "{-"
76
77-- | Close tie: @"-}"@
78tieClose :: String
79tieClose = "-}"
80
81-- | Open relation: @"{="@
82relOpen :: String
83relOpen = "{="
84
85-- | Close relation: @"=}"@
86relClose :: String
87relClose = "=}"
88
89-- | Open interpreation: @"{|"@
90interpOpen :: String
91interpOpen = "{|"
92
93-- | Close interpreation: @"|}"@
94interpClose :: String
95interpClose = "|}"
96
97-- | Open type: @"[-"@
98typeOpen :: String
99typeOpen = "[-"
100
101-- | Close type: @"-]"@
102typeClose :: String
103typeClose = "-]"
104
